txt.en: 'You see, the Wainriders have been stirred from their long rest, and I believe your Host has riled the evils that lingered upon this plain...'
'Even now, they ride from the East... and their might is no less swift or terrible than it was in days past.'
'You speak the impossible! Such things cannot be...'
'They cannot and yet they are, Artamir. These are times unlike any I have known...'
